pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.1_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.2_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.3_0: akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.4_0: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.5_0: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:1.7_0: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3_0: Pañcamāsakaṁ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati,
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.4_0: atirekamāsakaṁ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati,
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5_0: māsakaṁ vā ūnamāsakaṁ vā agghanakaṁ adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.6_0: adinnaṁ ādiyanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.1_0: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.2_0: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.3_0: Manussaṁ odissa opātaṁ khaṇati “papatitvā marissatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.4_0: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:3.6_0: sañcicca manussaviggahaṁ jīvitā voropanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.1_0: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.2_0: Asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.3_0: pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.4_0: “yo te vihāre vasati so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:4.6_0: asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.4_0: ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:6.6_0: upakkamitvā asucimocanapaccayā imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.3_0: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati,
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.4_0: bhikkhu kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:7.8_0: kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjanapaccayā imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.1_0: Mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.2_0: vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.3_0: vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati,
pli-tv-pvr1.10:8.4_0: kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.1_0: Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.2_0: mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.3_0: paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:9.4_0: tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.3_0: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:10.4_0: paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṁsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:11.1_0: Saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:12.1_0: Mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.1_0: Bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.2_0: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:13.3_0: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.1_0: Bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.2_0: anokāsaṁ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṅghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.10:14.3_0: okāsaṁ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:15.1_0: Saṅghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:16.1_0: Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:17.1_0: Dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:18.1_0: Kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati—
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.1_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.2_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:19.4_0: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
